rows.label: xs03020100_MSG0001
rows.name: Now for the job—let's get down to brass tacks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03020100_MSG0003
rows.name:
Last contact we had, they were installing
a data probe out in eastern Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03020100_MSG0005
rows.name: Are we talkin' indigens here or what?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03020100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Your guess is as good as mine.
But they did have a Skell with them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03020100_MSG0007
rows.name: You'd think they could hold their own—or at least run away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs03020100_MSG0008
rows.name:
All right, we're on it.
We'll head to their last known location and go from there.[ST:wait ]
